entity.name: COVID-19: Latest news updates from around the world
entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19

text: @NCDCgov @Fmohnigeria @FMICNigeria @nmanigeria @DrEOEhanire @LSMOH @FCTAbujaPHEOC @ProfAkinAbayomi @AfricaCDC @WHONigeria @nanonlineng They say the masks are infected, that China is secretly fighting a 3rd World War. Kindly test those masks and other materials to see if there is any COVID-19 found in them. Keep in mind that a Chinese can not give you anything for free! They have intentions and we are smarter
